title: The Last Thing He Told Me Book Club
itunes:title: The Last Thing He Told Me Book Club
description:
This month we read The Last Thing He Told Me by Laura Dave, one of both of our favorite authors. We were already HUGE Laura Dave fans (she’s also the author of Eight Hundred Grapes and Hello Sunshine), and we were so excited to see her branch into totally new territory with a thriller! In the book, Hannah Hall’s husband, Owen, disappears after only one year of marriage, leaving behind a note that reads: “Protect Her.” Her is Owen’s teen daughter Bailey. Hannah and Bailey work together to unravel the mystery of Owen’s true identity and why he disappeared.

 

Join us in the Facebook group to tell us what you thought!

Instagram:

  • @fsoceanclub
  • @fssurfside
  • @sunwoven

Obsessions:

  • St. Tropez Bronzing kit - Ashley Graham
  • Negative Underwear Sieve Bralettes
  • Mister Zimi Dresses

What We’re Reading:

  • Anna K Away by Jenny Lee
  • The Guncle by Steven Rowley
  • The Most Beautiful Girl in Cuba by Chanel Cleeton

June Book:

  • People We Meet on Vacation by Emily Henry

Sponsor:

  • Check out today’s top 5 books at todaystopbooks.com/bop and let us know what you think!
  • Betterhelp: Get 10% off your first month by visiting betterhelp.com/badonpaper.

Join our Facebook group for amazing book recs & more!

Like and subscribe to RomComPods. Available wherever you listen to podcasts. Visit Grace’s blog, The Stripe. New posts daily!

Follow us on Instagram @badonpaperpodcast. Follow Grace on Instagram @graceatwood and Becca @beccamfreeman.
